https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vBKaKTZOHh1LckBUm4bMlwSOAXB.jpg Film made with analog 35mm photo camera framed vertically. The sound that arises is caused by the image extending over the optical sound track. The content focuses on the descent made from a building in the Plaza de España in Madrid, honoring the great Spanish filmmaker Iván Zulueta. — AP Descenso
